banner.title: Not sure where to begin? Take the quiz!
banner.text: Take our quiz and receive a personalized checklist to help guide you through retirement.

landing.title: Retirement Ready Quiz
landing.p1: Not sure you've checked all the boxes to retire? Take this quiz as a first step towards your retirement checklist.
landing.p2: Your answers will help identify government pensions and benefits you could receive. They will also guide you on what to consider to better prepare for retirement.
landing.p3: You don't need any special information to take this quiz. To create the most appropriate retirement checklist, you will need to provide information on the following:
landing.legalextra: (such as Canadian citizen, Indian Status, or permanent resident)
landing.retirementextra: (when you plan on retiring, where you plan on living in retirement, etc.)

sections.title: Managing your money in retirement
sections.body: Prepare for old age by exploring retirement income sources and learn how to manage your money after you retire.

cards.title: Main sources of retirement income
cards.body: Learn about federal benefits, private retirement savings, and how they work together

cards.title: Planning to save for retirement
cards.body: Explore how to maximize your savings and better manage your money in retirement.

sections.title: Making retirement decisions
sections.body: Feel more confident about your choices in retirement. Use these resources to better understand your options and their impact on your benefits.

cards.title: When to take government pensions
cards.body: You can choose when to start your old age benefits. Understand what to consider in making that decision.

cards.title: From work to retirement
cards.body: Many Canadians continue to work in retirement. Learn how the money you earn has an impact on your benefits.

cards.title: Rules of thumb for federal old age benefits
cards.body: Pension tips based on your personal situation.

sections.title: Real-life retirement stories
sections.body: Not sure when to retire? Read the stories that people shared with us. Learn about the different choices and compare them to your personal situation.
